titles: An answer vnto my lord of wynthesters [sic] booke intytlyd a detection of the deuyls sophistrye wherwith he robith the vnlernyd people of the trew byleef in the moost blessyd sacrament of the aulter made by Johann Hoper.
author: Hooper, John, d. 1555.
notes: A reply to Gardiner, Stephen.  A detection of the Devils sophistrie.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Gardiner, Stephen, 1483?-1555. --  Detection of the Devils sophistrie --  Controversial literature.
